title: 1Bed 1Bath.- 304 BELMONT LN #304 NORTH LAUDERDALE. 1900MO.-
posting_body: ['WE CAN HELP YOU BUY OR RENT PROPERTY RIGHT AWAY!!!', '</blockquote', '304 BELMONT LN #304 NORTH LAUDERDALE, FL 33068-4266', 'Phone       ###…….954.', '*`*.', '744**`.', '04*`.70', '1/1 fabulous coach home.', 'Very spacious, unique.', 'Open floor plan with vaulted ceilings.', 'Very light and bright.', 'Tiled floor, master bedroom has a lovely master bath and also a charming French door to covered balcony.', 'Oversized garage.', 'Gated community in the heart of Boynton just minutes from the beach, the mall, delray and 1-95.', 'Great, full amenity community!!!', '1 Bed / 1 Bath ……… 1,900………..North LAUDERDALE', 'Contact Information…” SARAH”', '“”””954.', '*`*.', '744**`.', '04*`.70', '304 Belmont Ln #304 North Lauderdale, FL 33068-4266', 'IF YOU ARE LOOKING TO BUY  LET ME KNOW', 'AND WE CAN HELP YOU', 'TO PUT AN OFFER ON ANY PROPERTY FOR PURCHASE']
